Reviews.Title: never  worked.
Reviews.Author: J Ghost "JDC"
Reviews.Content: this  is  a  complete  waste  of  time  and  money. after  following  the  instructions  the  device  did  not  record.clothes  hook  is  a  lot  larger  than  expected.

ProductInfo.Features:
If u want Black color hidden camera, pls search the ASIN:B00C5WZEJ8(copy and paste the ASIN into the Amazon search box)
Color: White; Video format: AVI; Resolution: 720x480 30fps; Motion activated recording
It can hold up to a 16 GB card for tons of storage and recording space (Note: the memory card is not included)
Bulid-in lithium battery which can make a video more that 120 mimutes
Cleverly disguised as a clothing hanger, with built in DVR, this hidden camera was designed for high quality covert video surveillance
ProductInfo.Name: New White Clothes Hook Hidden Camera for Home Security Motion Detection Security DVR Spy USA
